ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Guild Loot Rules
ygData.msgSnippet: Precisely why I started up a new character as an alternative to my primary who is stalled at 52 right now while I decide whether or not to go after the epic
ygData.messageBody:
Precisely why I started up a new character as an alternative to my primary
who is stalled at 52 right now while I decide whether or not to go after the
epic (don't want to hit 53 and not be able to go after Vox). I'm still a
bard at heart and not totally retired but I find myself spending more and
more time playing my cleric...its fun to go back to the lower levels again
with all the experience I have gained as a bard. Less politics, less
stress, fewer 12 hour + camps...relaxing and fun again.

Faras Tar'Linedhel
52 Minstrel
E'ci


-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2001 10:24 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guild Loot Rules


Too true, when it becomes more like a job than a game, you get this tag
after your name:

Shada [Retired]


> Fun" becomes something you look forward to
> having once in
> a while. Hmm maybe I need a break.
>
> Halana/Tani
> <Paradigm>
> Solusek Ro
